comments:
Build ID: eclipse 3.3 M4

Steps To Reproduce:
1. start a gmf example using callisto and installing  emf and gef also.
2. make a gmf project.

Gives an Application error, possibly could not find the plugins, This is found only in Equinox

More information:
java.lang.RuntimeException: Application "org.eclipse.ui.ide.workbench" could not be found in the registry. I don't understand how to reproduce the pb. Could you please detail?

It looks like the org.eclipse.ui.ide.workbench bundle is not installed or resolved.  Can you run with -console -noExit then run the "ss" command at the osgi> console.  Please attach the output here.

Moving to bundles since that is where the application container is (org.eclipse.equinox.app)

Please re-open if you can provide more info.
Thanks.
